data.text: @Lorna_Luft @ladygaga How sweet of you to support this new film; and I hope it will turn many youngsters onto your mother's version, too! #MoviesAreMagic!! :)
@Lorna_Luft @BettyBuckley @ladygaga Thank you Lorna for that gratuitous statement, it will calm the worries of even your great mothers biggest fans!❤️

@Lorna_Luft @BettyBuckley @ladygaga I just watched your mother in A Star is Born and cried for an entire day. She should have won the Oscar! I was extremely moved by her performance. God bless her! And I hope you are doing well...been praying.
@Lorna_Luft @ladygaga Another incarnation but never an imitation ❤️
